metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38576 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A BIOS bug in firmware for a particular PC model leaves the Platform authorization value empty. This can be used to permanently brick the TPM in multiple ways, as well as to non-permanently DoS the system.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-07-05, upstream bug is private

criterions.comment: edk2 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-07-05').
